title: Paneer Tikka Pizza
description: Tender Paneer Tikka, Corn, Olives, Onion, Mozzarella Cheese. Enjoy the deliciousness of paneer with colourful veggies in every bite!

title: Overload Cheese Pizza
description: Mozzarella Cheese, Parsley. Relish an abundance of rich Mozzarella cheese in every bite, topped with finely chopped parsley, on a herbed, soft crust.

title: Five Cheese Burst Pizza
description: Paneer Tikka, Jalapenos, Black Olives, American Corn, Onion, Mozzarella Cheese. Relish our awesome five-some veggie combo gooey cheese!

title: Falafel Cheese Burst Pizza
description: Falafels, Roasted Crunchy Veggies, Mozzarella Cheese. Delicate Mediterranean flavours entangled with the abundance of pure molten cheese!
alt: Veg Falafel Supreme Pizza Cheese Burst Pizza

title: Maharaja Cheese Burst Pizza
description: Paneer Tikka, Jalapenos, Bell Peppers, Olives, Onion, Mozzarella Cheese. A generous spread of paneer chunks & delicious veggies!
alt: Maharaja Veg Cheese Burst Pizza Pizza

title: Double Cheese Margherita Pizza
description: Our Double Cheese Margherita pizza, coupled with melt-in-the-mouth creamy cheese inside a herbed, soft crust.
alt: Double Cheese Margherita Cheese Burst Pizza
